content: This PR renames docs#MeasureTheory.snorm to MeasureTheory.eLpNorm. It is quite huge (+1,284 −1,257) but mechanical. It might rot quickly.
Given that it is so big, could people agree/disagree to the rename somewhat quickly?

I'm content with this rename, if @Sébastien Gouëzel is happy with the deprecations now. @Yury G. Kudryashov do you have an opinion here? I'd prefer not to hit merge myself since the measure theory part of the library is not exactly my stomping grounds currently.
